    Components




Buttons, Button Groups


  

  

    

      
        Button
      
    

    

  

  

    

      
    

    

  









  

    
Button colors


    
For customize colors, add class blue, green, orange,
      grey or black beside the btn class.

    
    
    
    

    

    
    
    
    
  

  

    
Button states


    
For disabled buttons, add the disabled class to the link and the disabled
      attribute for button and input tags.

    

    
For pressed buttons, add the pressed class beside btn class.

    
  

  

    
Button sizes


    
For customize sizes, add class mini, medium, large or x-large
      beside class btn.


    

      
    

    

      
    

    

      
    

    

      
    

  









  

    
Button groups

        
            

              
              
              
            

        

    


    

      Anchor
      Anchor
      Anchor
    

    


    

      
      
      
    

    

  

  

    
Button group colors


    
Similar to button, add class blue, green, orange, red,
      grey, black beside the blue class to customize colors.


    

      
      
      
    


    
Button group states


    
Similar to button, add class disabled or pressed beside the btn-group
      class.


    

      
      
      
    

    


    

      
      
      
    

  

  

    
Button group sizes


    
Similar to buttons, button groups provides mini, medium, large and x-large
      sizes.


    

      
      
      
    

    


    

      Medium
      Medium
    

    


    

      
      
    

    


    

      
      
    

  









  

    
Button menus


    
Button menu just work with button & a tags.

        
            

              
              
    
                
  • Item1
    • 
                
  • Item2
    • 
                
  • Item3
    • 
              

            

        

    

      Anchor
      
    
        
  • Item1
    • 
        
  • Item2
    • 
        
  • Item3
    • 
      

    

        
            <div class="btn-menu">
              <button>Button</button>
                <ul>
                  <li><a href="#">Item1</a></li>
                  <li><a href="#">Item2</a></li>
                  <li><a href="#">Item3</a></li>
                </ul>
            </div>
        

  

  

    
Button menu colors


    
For customize button menu colors, add class blue, green, orange,
      red, grey or black beside the btn-menu class.


    

      
      
    
        
  • Item1
    • 
        
  • Item2
    • 
        
  • Item3
    •

  • Item3

  • Item1
    • 
        
  • Item2
    • 
        
  • Item3
    • 
      

    

        
            <div class="btn-menu blue">
              <button>Button</button>
              <ul>
                ...
              </ul>
            </div>
        

  

  

    
Button menu sizes


    
For customize button menu sizes, add class mini, medium, large or
      x-large beside the btn-menu class.

    
      <div class="btn-menu medium">
        <button>Button</button>
        <ul>
          ...
        </ul>
      </div>

Split buttons

    
Split buttons just work with button & a tags.

    
      

        
        
        
    
          
  • Item 1
    • 
          
  • Item 2
    • 
          
  • Item 3
    • 
        

      

    
    

      Anchor
      
      
    
        
  • Item 1
    • 
        
  • Item 2
    • 
        
  • Item 3
    • 
      

    

    
    

  

  

    
Split button colors

    
For customize split button colors, add class blue, green, orange,
      red, grey or black beside the btn-split class.

    

      
      
      
    
        
  • Item 1
    • 
        
  • Item 2
    • 
        
  • Item 3
    • 
      

    

    

      Anchor
      
      
    
        
  • Item 1
    • 
        
  • Item 2
    • 
        
  • Item 3

  • Item 2

  • Item 3

  • Item 1

  • Item 3
    • 
      

    

    

      
      
      
    
        
  • Item 1
    • 
        
  • Item 2
    • 
        
  • Item 3
    • 
      

    

    
      <div class="btn-split blue">
        <button>Button</button>
        <button></button>
        <ul>
          ...
        </ul>
      </div>
    

  

  

    
Split button sizes

    
For customize split button sizes, add class mini, medium, large or
      x-large beside the btn-split class.

    
      <div class="btn-split medium">
        <button>Button</button>
        <button></button>
        <ul>
          ...
        </ul>
      </div>
